text: I am very disappointed with the service I recieved today. I tried to place an order online this morning, but the system was down due to the power outage that occurred last night; my order was rejected. I waited roughly an hour before â€¦More

text: Donâ€™t live around this location but I do frequent Pizza Hut at two separate locations in my home town. I ordered a pizza for carry out and brought it home and was astonished. Started looking for welding jobs closer to this location.

text: Took over an hour to arrive from when Pizza Tracker said Out For Delivery... and pizza shows up room temperature. Both times. â€¦More

name: Kay Smitty
text: We ordered pizza 2 hours ago arrive 10 minutes ago and was ghosting my entire family. Now that we have it we dont trust it because the grease is fully soaked into the box and theres holes in the pizza, and the pepperoni is stiff. We can tell it's old. We are taking it back to the store now and getting a refund. Not cool pizza hut.

text: They used to deliver to us but apparently they don't answer their phone's anymore and the next location can't help out. Honestly the cashier at the other location said if I can't get a hold of them then he can't get a hold of them. â€¦More

name: lisa graves
text: Obviously I ordered the wrong Pizza online. When I got there look at my pizza it was not what I thought I ordered. The Man behind the counter was very very nice. He offered to remake the pizza that I wanted. The pizza was made wonderfully! Great food! great place!great service!

text: My pizza was delicious and was ready at the time promised.

name: Teresa Malott
text: Delicious pizza at a good price! Store was BUSY but staff was working hard and still had a great attitude!! Thank you!!

name: Kelly Johnson
text: I would give a million negative stars if I could. My fiancÃ©e and I ordered a pizza from here on Sept 1. Unfortunately the pizza was a lot thinner than we would have liked (we ordered hand tossed) although the pizza was made nicely. My â€¦More

text: Quick option for a carry out order. Order was ready right on time and everything came out great. Team inside was hustling to make pizzas and came right over to ring up my order.

name: terrance shipmon
text: prices are not competitive when it comes to ingredients such as cheese: $2 for extra cheese not considered an ingredient. I was very disappointed in the taste of the pizza

name: Rahul M
text: Great little pizza carryout/delivery place. I normally do carryout as it's en route home on my daily commute. Place order online, pay online or in store, always ready on time. It is a chain pizza place, so everything is an assembly line â€¦More

name: Matthew Monroe
text: Loved coming here as a kid and even now but after today i wont spend money with this place due to the rude lady running it. You work in customer service act like it and conduct yourself accoringly. Dont like your job or career path? Find a new one. Bad business edicate.

text: Ordered at 10:17 tonight online and it said it would be here at 11:17, the delivery guy got here at least 20 minutes before that and was extremely nice. Love the quality of the food at this location. This was my first time trying (i saw an â€¦More
